original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṁsenti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū bhikkhum amūlakena saṅgha ādisesena anuddhasenti

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuṁ amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṁsessantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma chabbaggiyāḥ bhikkhū bhikkhum amūlakena saṅgha ādisesena an uddhasessanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhuṁ amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṁsethā”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tumhe bhikkhave bhikkhum amūlakena saṅgha ādisesena an uddhasetha ati

original: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhuṁ amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṁsessatha.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tumhe mogha purisāḥ bhikkhum amūlakena saṅgha ādisesena an uddhasessatha
neta moghapurisāḥ appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha

original: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṁ amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṁseyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ pana bhikkhu bhikkhum amūlakena saṅgha adisesena an uddhaseyya pācittiyan ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetaḥ bhikkhu iti
a diṭṭham a ssutam a parisaṅkita

original: codeti vā codāpeti vā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: codeti vā codāpeti vā āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Upasampanne upasampannasaññī amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṁseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: upasampanne upasampanna saññī amūlakena saṅgha ādisesena anuddhaseti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Upasampanne vematiko amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṁseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: upasampanne vematikaḥ amūlakena saṅgha ādisesena anuddhaseti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Upasampanne anupasampannasaññī amūlakena saṅghādisesena anuddhaṁseti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
analyzed: upasampanne anupasampanna saññī amūlakena saṅgha ādisesena anuddhaseti āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Ācāravipattiyā vā diṭṭhivipattiyā vā anuddhaṁseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: ācāra vipattiyā vā diṭṭhi vipattiyā vā anuddhaseti āpatti dukkaṭassa
an upasampannam an uddhaseti āpatti dukkaṭassa
an upasampanne upasampanna saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
an upasampanne an upasampanna saññī āpatti dukkaṭassa
tathā saññī codeti vā codāpeti vā
